task.title: OBS Studio Quickstart
task.shortdesc: If you are a new user or just want to setup OBS Studio quickly, you can use the quickstart guide.

step.info: After installing and launching OBS Studio for the first time, the Auto-Configuration Wizard will open automatically.
The Auto-Configuration Wizard will automatically test your system and adjust your initial settings that your system can handle.
OBS Studio uses your default audio input (microphone) and output (desktop audio) sources. You can see what audio source is captured in the Audio Mixer box.
You can also manually change the audio device by going to the audio setting and selecting the desired device. More info on the audio settings is given in the related topics.
OBS Studio does not connect a video source by default. You will need to select a video source. You can do this by selecting "Add Source" button in the Source box.
You can take a look at the related topics for more information on video sources.

step.cmd: Hit Start Recording or Start Streaming!
step.info: You've setup your audio and video sources and are now ready to start recording or streaming!
